comments: Let G = {1,3,7,9}, and let the binary operator o be defined as: X o Y = least significant digit of the product XY, where X,Y belong to G. Then (G,o) is an Abelian group and 3 is a generator of this group. [From _K.V.Iyer_, Apr 19 2009]3^n mod 10 and 3^n mod 20.
